title: Bacon and white bean soup
description: This hearty soup can be whipped together in minutes and is a great way to use white beans from your store cupboard. For this recipe you will need a blender or a food processor. With a GI of 48 this meal is high protein, low GI and provides 189 kcal per portion.

default: 2 x 400g cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over a medium heat. Add the bacon, garlic and onion and fry for 3-4 minutes, or until the bacon begins to brown and the onion softens.
Add the thyme and fry for a further minute. Add the beans and stock to the pan and bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Transfer the soup to a blender or food processor and blend with the parsley and pepper until smooth.
Return the soup to the pan and heat through, then ladle into 4 bowls and serve immediately.
